  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 Ti
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps with graphics settings at "High". Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. - 64-bit processor and operating system are required. - Windows 10 (Version 1809 or later) and a 4GB VRAM GPU (graphics board or video card) are required for DirectX 12 API.

  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.2+ GHz & SSE2 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGLCore capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested successfully on a MacBook Pro (13-inch, M1, 2020) running 11.6.1. Tested successfully on a MacBook Air (13-inch, i7, Early 2014) running 10.13.6. Performance on both is acceptable, despite the lack of a dedicated GPU.
